author: @bhavinmakwana7411

text:
Hi, 

my name is Yuvnesh and I purchased Hero Vida on 6th August 2025. Just after 100 KM, I noticed a ticking sound from it Motor (Engine Compartment). So I visited Hero Service Centre on 8th Aug 2025. The service did not open the Job Card and told me this is my Illusion. When the ticking sound increases, then I visited HERO VIDA Service Centre on 10th August 2025. And finally, Service Centre Guys noticed the sound and told me that sound is coming from it Gear Box and the Gear box needs to be replaced. As per the HERO VIDA Service Centre, the happened due to low amount of Gear box oil in gear box.

text: My name is Yuvnesh and I purchased Hero Vida on 6th August 2025. Just after 100 KM, I noticed a ticking sound from it Motor (Engine Compartment). author: @DjRajesh-f2s

text: For the query on BaaS. I like the 3 yr plan. Keeping electricity bill aside. Whatever may be your daily running, if you take whole scooter it  will cost you 92 to 93k on road after getting subsidy of 17000 in our state. When you buy it in BaaS it will cost you 105000 after subsidy out of which only 65k you are paying now and get subsidy of same 17k. Rest 57600 you are paying in 3 years. So total difference only 13 to 14 k.. and there you get ext warranty worth 6000 free. So effective difference is only 8000rs in 3 years. Which is quite good deal.  But read terms of BAAS properly. Its not like MG.. battery is rented but responsibility is of user.
